overview: UFC 160: Velasquez vs. Bigfoot 2 was a mixed martial arts event held on May 25, 2013, at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event was a rematch between former UFC Heavyweight Champion Cain Velasquez and Ant√¥nio Silva. In their first encounter at UFC 146 a year earlier, Velasquez defeated Silva via first-round TKO.
title: UFC 160: Velasquez vs Bigfoot 2
